# NumberFormatter.RoundingMode

**Enumeration**

These constants are used to specify how numbers should be rounded. These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/roundingMode-swift.property] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum RoundingMode
```

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode.ceiling**: Round towards positive infinity.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode.floor**: Round towards negative infinity.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode.down**: Round towards zero.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode.up**: Round away from zero.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode.halfEven**: Round towards the nearest integer, or towards an even number if equidistant.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode.halfDown**: Round towards the nearest integer, or towards zero if equidistant.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode.halfUp**: Round towards the nearest integer, or away from zero if equidistant.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.Style**: The predefined number format styles used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/numberStyle] property.
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior**: These constants specify the behavior of a number formatter. These constants are returned by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/defaultFormatterBehavior()] class method and the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/formatterBehavior] property.
- **NumberFormatter.PadPosition**: These constants are used to specify how numbers should be padded. These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/paddingPosition] property.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
